title: The idea of a mesh network
content: I came up with the idea of creating my own mesh network. Moreover, this is a rather ambitious idea, since I want to transfer not just text messages, but also files. But what if you create your own mesh Internet at all?

title: Starting Peplocoder
content: The first steps in building my personal digital space. Stay tuned for updates!

content: AshCoders was born from the idea of making meaningful software with creativity and precision.
